ED_Title: Appointment of the members of the Credentials Committee
ED_DecisionText:
At its 1st plenary meeting, on 18 September 2018, the General Assembly, in accordance with rule 28 of its rules of procedure, appointed a Credentials Committee for its seventy-third session consisting of the following Member States: ANTIGUA AND BARBUDA, CHILE, CHINA, FINLAND, GHANA, PALAU, THE RUSSIAN FEDERATION, SIERRA LEONE AND THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA.

(See A/73/PV.1)
ED_Disclaimer: The final text of this decision will be contained in document A/73/49 (Vol. II) after editorial review.
